abstracts.cdata!:
The Hebei Urban Environment Project will
            establish wastewater treatment plants in Shijiazhuang,
            Tangshan, and Handan Cities. This resettlement action plan
            describes the policy and standards of relocation and
            compensation. Policies on house demolition, relocation, and
            compensation of the project are as follows: The compensation
            standards of all property affected should be fixed in
            accordance with replacement principles. The compensation
            should be paid before the requisition of land and property.
            Project Offices should negotiate with the owners of affected
            property about the standards of relocation and compensation
            and resettlement methods. The shops that will be affected by
            the project and stop doing business due to such construction
            shall get compensation for loss from suspense of business in
            accordance with average profit of each shop, the wage of the
            employees, and the actual cessation period. More attention
            will be paid to shorten the construction period and reduce
            the loss from the suspense of business. The affected public
            infrastructure should be restored and reconstructed. The
            land compensation and resettlement subsidy for the
            requisitioned land should be calculated and paid in
            accordance with Land Administration Law. Agricultural
            laborers will be offered relocation assistance, training,
            and employment opportunities. Full compensation for crops
            and other attached facilities should be calculated based on
            market prices. Illegal buildings will be compensated.
